name: shoal-shell
short_effect: No effect. Gen III: Trade four and four Shoal Salts for a Shell Bell.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A seashell found deep inside the SHOAL CAVE.
flavor_text.emerald: A seashell found deep inside the SHOAL CAVE.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A pretty seashell found deep inside the SHOAL CAVE. It is striped in blue and white.
